text: The Committee on Credentials is a 1916 American silent western movie directed by George Marshall and starring Harry Carey, George Berrell, Neal Hart, Joe Rickson, Olive Carey. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1916 movies Category:1910s Western (genre) movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by George Marshall Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: The Committee on Credentials
